summary: Makes Gilded Wristguards craftable at forge both for clothes and armor
descriptionHtml:
New Version 3.0.0 

Adds a heavy version to the light version and the non-armor version it is
forged with a 1 leather and 1 steel and tempered with 1 steel
_______________________________________________
And now for something completely diffrent the only way to obtain this rare item is once and only once in such a huge game like skyrim and i find unfair .
This mods makes a beatifull pair of  gauntlets 
to be crafted and upgraded with a steel ingot at the forge both for clothes and armor .
 Recipe? You may ask simple i say 5 leather strips for clothes version and 5 leather strips and 1 steel ignot for armored version both versions are included . Also i fixed the invetory problem were the Gilded Wristguards in the females appeared as a Nightingale Gloves as always you can download it either with NMM (nexus mod manager) or by downloading manually unzip it and place it at \\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data then when you open skyrim and go at data files and then you selectGilded Wristguards (if it is not already selected ) .
Have fun with it :D
author: Garuger
